name: afnccf-aim-questionnaire
description: Anna Freud Centre's AIM Questionnaire tools for TiddlyWiki

scripts.build: npx tiddlywiki wiki --output ./output --load languages/en-GB/ --build index && npx tiddlywiki wiki --output ./output/es-ES --load languages/es-ES/ --build index && npx tiddlywiki wiki --output ./output/de-DE --load languages/de-DE/ --build index

author: Jeremy Ruston
